mapper.select: select ps.bas_no bas_no,d.dro_name dro_name,p.mem_name mem_name,bas_amount,bas_price,bas_rental,bas_return,bas_time,pos_no,dro_series,pil_career,dro_photo,pos_price,bas_price*0.01 point,mem_no,ps.mem_point mem_point from ( select bas_no,p.pos_no,mem_no,bas_amount,bas_price,bas_rental,bas_return,bas_time,pil_no,dro_no,pos_price,mem_point from (select b.*,m.mem_point from basket b,member m where m.mem_no=b.mem_no and m.mem_no = (select mem_no from member where mem_id=#{mem_id})) b,possesion p where b.pos_no = p.pos_no) ps left outer join drone d on (ps.dro_no= d.dro_no) left outer join (select pil_no,mem_name,pil_career from pilot p,member m where p.mem_no = m.mem_no) p on (ps.pil_no=p.pil_no) order by bas_no
